titles.title: Small Business Job Protection Act of 2017
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the definition of applicable large employer for purposes of the employer mandate in the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act.
Small Business Job Protection Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Small Business Job Protection Act of 2017
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code, as amended by the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, to redefine "applicable large employer," for purposes of the mandate requiring employers to provide health insurance for their employees, to mean an employer with at least 100 full-time employees (currently, 50).
